I hope this email finds you well.

I am reaching out to you because unfortunately tonight a serious accident occurred in the Ray Ban Store in Marassi Mall.

 

As you can check in the attached video, a piece of the ceiling fell. Fortunately, no one was affected as it happened at 7:00 AM local time.

 

In order to ensure we are covered for such inconveniences, could you please ask your admin team to share copies of the insurance contracts for the Ray Ban, David Clulow and Oliver Peoples stores under BGDC and CGA to @Mangili Simone <mailto:simone.mangili@luxottica.com>  and @Iannella Federico <mailto:Federico.Iannella@ae.luxottica.com> ?

 

BAHRAIN Store list:

*	David Clulow BCC
*	Ray-Ban BCC
*	Ray-Ban Marassi

 

KSA Store list:

*	Oliver Peoples RSM

*	Ray-Ban RSM
*	David Clulow optical Nakheel Mall
*	Ray-Ban Riyadh Park 

 

Your prompt attention to this matter will be greatly appreciated.

 

Please let us know if any additional information is required from our side.

 

Best regards,

Enrico Camassa

ELC Retail General Manager

Dear GMs,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

I am reaching out to you because unfortunately tonight a serious accident occurred in the Ray Ban Store in Marassi Mall.

 

As you can check in the attached video, a piece of the ceiling fell. Fortunately, no one was affected as it happened at 7:00 AM local time.

 

In order to ensure we are covered for such inconveniences, could you please ask your admin team to share copies of the insurance contracts for the Ray Ban, David Clulow and Oliver Peoples stores under BGDC and CGA to @Mangili Simone <mailto:simone.mangili@luxottica.com>  and @Iannella Federico <mailto:Federico.Iannella@ae.luxottica.com> ?

 

BAHRAIN Store list:

*	David Clulow BCC
*	Ray-Ban BCC
*	Ray-Ban Marassi

 

KSA Store list:

*	Oliver Peoples RSM

*	Ray-Ban RSM
*	David Clulow optical Nakheel Mall
*	Ray-Ban Riyadh Park 

 

Your prompt attention to this matter will be greatly appreciated.

 

Please let us know if any additional information is required from our side.

 

Best regards,

Enrico Camassa

ELC Retail General Manager 

 

Disclaimer
